summary: AN ORDINANCE related to the West Galer Street grade-separated access ramp; authorizing the execution of an interlocal agreement with King County and the Port of Seattle that will provide funding by the three governments for a grade-separated crossing of the railroad tracks at approximately West Galer Street to improve access to the vicinity of Marine Terminal 88 and will commit the City to construct the crossing under certain conditions, and authorizing amendments to that interlocal agreement.
